Package com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Algorithm
    An abstract type for all solving strategies to extend.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlgebraicParticle
    Represents an AlgebraicParticle.
    Equation
    Represents an algebraic equation
    Expression
    Represents an algebraic expression with positive and negative terms
    Fraction
    Contains a fraction with expressions on top and bottom.
    MixedNumber
    Holds a fraction and integer value, which can be used as an exponent.
    Number
    Represents a integer or decimal such as 35, 45.25, 56.36, 3.1415926535, and provides methods for adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing numbers.
    Root
    Holds a root for any expression, e.g âˆš(4x+6)
    Solution
    Represents a solution for a given equation or expression by holding a Step ArrayList.
    Solver
    Solves equations and simplifies expressions
    Step
    Represents a single step in solving or simplifying an equation or expression.
    Term
    Provides a way to work with terms in equations.
    Util
    Provides static utility methods for use with String equations.
    Validator
    Checks to see if an expression or equation is valid.
    Variable
    Represents a variable, A-Z or a-z
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Solver.SolveFor
    Represents the possible different ways to solve.

    Exception Description
